name: The Power of Pride
description:
For many LGBTQIA+ individuals, facing discrimination is not just a feature of an 8-bit game — it is their lived reality. From the perspective of a young LGBTQIA+ individual living in a hostile household and in the context of the global backslide in the status of LGBTQIA+ rights and acceptance, this quest-based game features a journey to a local Pride Parade – a journey starting with challenges and ending with comfort and confidence. 

Use your arrow keys to navigate and interact with the blue-colored characters, understand some of the struggles LGBTQIA+ individuals face, and discover the power of pride.
